titleInfo.title: Letter No.2 from Lewis Pelly, Herat to Charles Alison, British Minister at Tehran

mods.abstract: Letter reporting how he had attempted to pass through Herat territory without much attention but intelligence had been received at Herat of his approach, and the sons of Sultan Ahmed Khan had been sent to accompany him into Herat.The letter goes on to give Pelly's reasons for having despatached a special messenger to take his letter recounting his meeting with the Sirdar Sultan Ahmed Khan back to Tehran; his discussions with the Sultan which have been frank and open discussing the past and present difficulties of his position, his views and prospects for the future, the impact of the Afghan War, and his observations of Dost Mohamed Khan.
